endpoints.name: forecast
endpoints.description: Get weather forecast data for a location

elevation.description: Elevation of the location in meters

generationtime_ms.description: Time taken to generate the forecast in milliseconds

rate_limits.notes: Open-Meteo offers free tier with no strict rate limiting. Commercial use has fair-use policy. No API key required for free tier.

common_errors.reason: Unprocessable Entity - Missing or invalid required parameters

notes: No authentication required for free tier
Uses query parameters for all API options
Supports multiple weather variables and aggregation levels
Latitude and longitude are always required parameters
Temperature unit, windspeed unit, and precipitation unit can be customized
Timezone parameter accepts IANA timezone identifiers
API supports current, hourly, daily, and minutely data at different granularities
Response includes generation time in milliseconds
Large number of optional parameters for customizing forecast data
Free tier has no API key requirement but may have fair-use limits
